Reference

Image operations

Import, show and export images

image_import() image_export() image_show() image_pliman()

Import, display and export images

image_combine()

Combines images to a grid

Image transformation

Performs spatial transformations such as rotation, reflection, and resizing

image_dimension() image_rotate() image_horizontal() image_vertical() image_hreflect() image_vreflect() image_resize()

Spatial transformations

Utilities for files

Provides utilities for manipulating files

file_extension() file_name() file_dir() manipulate_files()

Utilities for file manipulation

Utilities for image resolution

Provides utilities for conversions between size (cm) and resolution (dpi)

dpi_to_cm() cm_to_dpi() pixels_to_cm() cm_to_pixels()

Utilities for image resolution

Image segmentation

Performs image segmentation based on indexes such as RGB bands or vegetation indexes

image_binary()

Creates a binary image

image_index() plot(<image_index>)

Image indexes

image_palette()

Create an image palette

image_segment()

Image segmentation

image_to_mat()

Convert an image to numerical matrices

Count objects

Count objects in an image

count_lesions()

Counts the number of lesions

count_objects()

Computes number of objects in an image

get_measures() plot_measures()

Utilities for object measures

objects_rgb() plot(<objects_rgb>)

Get Red Green and Blue for image objects

Leaf area

Calculates the leaf area using an image with leaves and a template with a known area

leaf_area()

Calculates the leaf area

Symptomatic area

Calculates the percentage of symptomatic leaf area based in a sample or entire leaf based on provided color palettes samples

symptomatic_area()

Calculates the percentage of symptomatic area
